View all scalars specifier

Source: R/views.R
VIEW_ALL_SCALARS.Rd

A pair to use in the data parameter of viewer to expose all base scalars with their original names. See the Julia documentation for details.

Usage

VIEW_ALL_SCALARS

Format

A named list representing the pair ALL_SCALARS => "="

References

https://tanaylab.github.io/DataAxesFormats.jl/v0.1.2/views.html#DataAxesFormats.Views.VIEW_ALL_SCALARS
